title: Linux tee Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the versatile tee command in Linux, learn how to redirect output to both a file and the terminal, and append output to existing files.

meta.title: Linux tee Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the versatile tee command in Linux, learn how to redirect output to both a file and the terminal, and append output to existing files.
meta.keywords: Linux, tee command, file operations, terminal, output redirection, file management

steps.title: Append Output to an Existing File with tee

verify.hint: Make sure the sample.txt file contains the expected content after using the tee -a command to append the output.
